script.name: lib.guilds.drawtable
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
skip if $menu $menu = create custom menu array
if $a.rowDataType $a.rowData = $a.data['row.data'][$a.rowDataType] else $a.rowData = $a.data['row.data'] end $a.columnData = $a.data['column.data'] $a.sortColumn = $a.data['sort'] $a.invertSort = $a.data['sort.invert'] $a.filterName = $a.data['filter']
$page = $a.data['page'] $array.pages = $a.data['pages'] $page = $array.pages[$page] $a.columns = $a.columnData['pages'][$page]
$columns.count = size of array $a.columns
* draw the heading $text.cols = array alloc: size=$columns.count
$pos = 0 $text.cols = array alloc: size=$columns.count $column = 0 $column.size = size of array $a.columns while $column < $column.size $column.type = $a.columns[$column] $len = $a.columnData['length'][$column.type] do if $column == 0 $len = $len + 10 $text = $a.columnData['short.name'][$column.type] $is.right = $a.columnData['right'][$column.type] skip if $is.right $is.right = [FALSE] $text = create custom menu column string, position=$pos length=$len right=$is.right colour=null text=$text $text.cols[$column] = $text $pos = $pos + $len inc $column = end
add clickable heading: menu=$menu, text=$text.cols, id=$a.tableName, allow empty=[FALSE]
$filters = table alloc
$page.count = size of array $array.pages if $page.count > 1 $size = size of array $array.pages $aValues = array alloc: size=$size $i = 0 while $i < $size $p = $array.pages[$i] $text = $a.columnData['page.names'][$p] $aValues[$i] = $text inc $i = end $page = $a.data['page'] skip if $page $page = 0 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104349 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$page, return id='page', width=200 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu end
if $a.filters $filters.size = size of array $a.filters $f = 0 while $f < $filters.size $filter = $a.filters[$f] inc $f = $text = $a.columnData['long.name'][$filter] skip if $text $text = $a.columnData['short.name'][$filter] $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=3301, $text, null, null, null, null $table.filters = $a.data['filters'] if not $table.filters $table.filters = table alloc $a.data['filters'] = $table.filters end $default = $table.filters[$filter] skip if $default $default = 0 @ $aValues = [THIS] -> call script lib.guilds.menu.getfilterdata : Row Data=$a.rowData Filter=$filter $aValues = sort table keys: table=$aValues insert 'None' into array $aValues at index 0 $filters[$filter] = $aValues add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id=$filter, width=200 allowtabs=[FALSE] end add section to custom menu: $menu end
if $a.addSort $table.no.sort = $a.columnData['no.sort'] $array.data = array alloc: size=0 $column = 0 $column.size = size of array $a.columns $default = 0 while $column < $column.size $column.type = $a.columns[$column] if not $table.no.sort[$column.type] if not find $column.type in array: $array.data do if $column.type == $a.sortColumn $default = size of array $array.data append $column.type to array $array.data end end inc $column = end $size = size of array $array.data $aValues = array alloc: size=$size while $size dec $size = $column.type = $array.data[$size] $text = $a.columnData['long.name'][$column.type] skip if $text $text = $a.columnData['short.name'][$column.type] $aValues[$size] = $text end $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104350 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id='sort', width=200 allowtabs=[FALSE] $a.data['current.sort'] = $array.data
$aValues = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104352 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104353 $aValues[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104351 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$a.invertSort, return id='sort.invert', width=200 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu end
$rows.added = 0
inc $columns.count = if $a.rowData * sort the data by column $table.sort = table alloc $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=null while $ware $c.data = $a.rowData[$ware][$a.sortColumn]
* check the search filter if $a.filterName if get length of string $a.filterName $name = $a.rowData[$ware]['name'] do if is datatype[ $name ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $name = $name[0] if not case insensitive string match, is $a.filterName in $name $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=$ware continue end end end
* check the other filters $filter = get next key: table=$filters key=null while $filter $aValues = $filters[$filter] $default = $a.data['filters'][$filter] if $default > 0 $filter.by = $aValues[$default] $filter.data = $a.rowData[$ware][$filter] do if is datatype[ $filter.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $filter.data = $filter.data[1]
if is datatype[ $filter.data ] == DATATYPE_TABLE if not $filter.data[$filter.by] $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=$ware continue end else if is datatype[ $filter.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY if not find $filter.by in array: $filter.data $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=$ware continue end else if $filter.data != $filter.by $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=$ware continue end end end $filter = get next key: table=$filters key=$filter end
do if is datatype[ $c.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $c.data = $c.data[1] $table.sort[$ware] = $c.data $ware = get next key: table=$a.rowData key=$ware end
$sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.sort do if $a.invertSort $sorted.array = reverse array $sorted.array
$row = 0 $row.size = size of array $sorted.array while $row < $row.size $ware = $sorted.array[$row] $ware.data = $a.rowData[$ware] inc $row =
$text.cols = array alloc: size=$columns.count
$icon = $ware.data['icon'] if $icon $text = $icon $pos = 10 else $text = ' ' $pos = 0 end $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text
$column = 0 $column.size = size of array $a.columns while $column < $column.size $column.type = $a.columns[$column] inc $column = $c.data = $ware.data[$column.type] $len = $a.columnData['length'][$column.type]
if $column == 1 AND ! $icon $len = $len + 10 end
if is datatype[ $c.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $c.data = $c.data[0] end
$is.right = $a.columnData['right'][$column.type] skip if $is.right $is.right = [FALSE]
if is datatype[ $c.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $c.data.col = $c.data[0] if $c.data.col == '#COLUMN#' $c.data.i = 1 $c.data.size = size of array $c.data while $c.data.i < $c.data.size $c.data.col = $c.data[$c.data.i] $c.data.col = clone array: $c.data.col $col.pos = $c.data.col[1] $col.pos = $pos + $col.pos $c.data.col[1] = $col.pos if $c.data.i > 1 append $c.data.col to array $text.cols else $text.cols[$column] = $c.data.col end inc $c.data.i = end else $text = create custom menu column string, position=$pos length=$len right=$is.right colour=null text=$c.data $text.cols[$column] = $text end else $text = create custom menu column string, position=$pos length=$len right=$is.right colour=null text=$c.data $text.cols[$column] = $text end $pos = $pos + $len end
$ret = null if $a.returnScript $ret = [NULL] -> call named script: script=$a.returnScript, $ware, $ware.data, null, null, null end skip if $ret $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ware
if is datatype[ $ware ] == DATATYPE_WARE set menu line option: $menu, video display ware=$ware $speak = get text id: ware=$ware if $speak inc $speak = set menu line option: $menu, voiced description page=[Page.ObjDesc], id=$speak end $text = get ware description: ware=$ware if $text $side.menu = create custom menu array add custom menu hyperlinked info: menu=$side.menu, text=$text $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ware, null, null, null, null set menu option: $side.menu, set title text=$text set menu option: $side.menu, icon=29 *set menu line option: $menu, side menu=$side.menu end end add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret inc $rows.added = end end
if not $rows.added $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end
set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Identity], id='info' set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
return $menu

line.text: create custom menu column string, position=
sort table keys by value: table=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create menu return value: callback, value=
add custom menu hyperlinked info: menu=
add custom menu item to array
